scripts.say: (My hangar has taken damage... Her firepower might even be greater than Her Majesty's...)
(Taking one of my salvos head on and still being able to stand... so this is the famed armored carrier...)
Make this easier for us both and surrender. You've done us wrong, but your fate need not be to end up at the bottom of the Mediterraâ€“
More Swordfish...! But it'll take more than that...!
Behold, the Pugliese system! Your little toys cannot sink me!
What...! Even though I've struck her with so many torpedoes...
Nngh...! A battleship salvo?!
Illustrious, get back! Sardegnian battleships are coming!
Gah... I won't let you get away!
BOOOOOOM!
Aaagh! My steering gear...!
The Pugliese system absorbed some of the torpedo impact, but the impact angle had already caused flooding into the cabin, slowing Littorio's movement.
Littorio recognized her defeat, but instead turned towards her foes with bravado.
Signora Illustrious, it seems this victory is yours. Bitter as that may be, getting to witness your captivating beauty is almost as good as victory itself.
Hah... to think a ship even more glorious than me could exist in this world!
Lovely signora, I promise you we shall meet again. Hahahaha!
Littorio turned her back to the Royal Navy's fleet and withdrew from the battlefield.
So that's the Sardegnia Empire's battleship, Littorio... Still trying to show off even after taking so many hits...
It's not every day I see you having trouble with an opponent. Are you all right, Illustrious?
Yes, somehow. But I feel like this isn't the last time that we'll meet...
